Baleg DPR Target Sahkan 35 RUU Prioritas di Masa Sidang 2020
06 Nov 2019, 08:39 by , https://www.facebook.com/CNNIndonesia


Ilustrasi. (CNN Indonesia/Ramadhan Rizki Saputra)

Jakarta, CNN Indonesia -- Wakil Ketua Badan Legislasi DPR RI Willy Aditya menargetkan sekitar 30-35 rancangan peraturan perundang-undangan dapat disahkan oleh DPR pada masa sidang sepanjang tahun 2020."Sekitar 30-35 RUU, sifatnya yang reguler tahunan," kata Willy di Kompleks MPR/DPR, Senayan, Jakarta.Willy lantas merinci jumlah itu terdiri dari 22 RUU yang diusulkan oleh 11 komisi di DPR, 5 hingga 6 RUU usulan pemerintah dan sisanya merupakan RUU usulan Baleg.Meski menetapkan target namun Willy menegaskan DPR tak akan mengutamakan kuantitas RUU yang akan disahkan. Melainkan, kata dia, mengedepankan kualitas dari UU yang akan disahkan.Terlebih lagi, Willy mengatakan pemerintah melalui Menteri Hukum dan HAM Yasonna Laoly sempat mengatakan tak perlu membuat banyak RUU. Sebab, kata dia, banyak UU yang akan berstatus sebagai omnibus law."Kita butuh sinkronisasi perspektif. yang perlu kita geser yaitu perspektif kejar setoran," kata dia Willy optimistis target pengesahan 30-35 RUU dapat terpenuhi dalam waktu satu tahun. Ia mengatakan Baleg sedang menanti 11 komisi di DPR untuk menentukan RUU mana saja yang harus segera diprioritaskan pembahasannya. Usulan RUU itu akan dimasukkan dalam program legislasi nasional (Prolegnas). "Termasuk Baleg sendiri kami masih berdiskusi sangat intensif, dari Baleg sekitar lima UU mungkin yang akan kita bahas secara intensif dan benar-benar penting untuk kita dahulukan," ujar Willy. (rzr/wis)

Parliamentary Legislative Assembly Targeting 35 Priority Bills in 2020 Session Period
Nov 6 2019, 08:39 by, https://www.facebook.com/CNNIndonesia


Illustration. (CNN Indonesia / Ramadan Rizki Saputra)

Jakarta, CNN Indonesia - Deputy Chair of the Legislative Body of the Republic of Indonesia House of Representatives Willy Aditya is targeting around 30-35 draft laws and regulations to be passed by the Parliament during the 2020 session period. in the MPR / DPR Complex, Senayan, Jakarta.Willy then detailed the amount consisting of 22 bills proposed by 11 commissions in the DPR, 5 to 6 bills proposed by the government and the rest were bills proposed by the Legislative Body. the quantity of the bill to be passed. Instead, he said, putting forward the quality of the Act to be passed. Moreover, Willy said the government through the Minister of Justice and Human Rights Yasonna Laoly had said there was no need to make many bills. Because, he said, many laws will have the status of an omnibus law. "We need to synchronize perspectives. What we need to shift is the perspective of chasing deposits," he said. He said that the Legislative Body was waiting for 11 commissions in the DPR to determine which bills had to be immediately prioritized. The proposed bill will be included in the national legislation program (Prolegnas). "Including the Legislative Body itself we are still discussing very intensively, from the Legislative Body about five Laws that may be discussed intensively and are really important for us to put first," Willy said.
